mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm(mad, time, date, pid) VALUES (#{mad},#{time},#{date},#{pid})
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm SET BUTTON=#{button} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alarm WHERE DATE=CURDATE() AND PID=#{pid}

SELECT al.mad AS mad, al.time AS time, al.button AS button, al.pid AS pid, pl.hospital AS phos FROM alarm al JOIN plist pl ON al.pid = pl.id WHERE pl.uid = #{uid} AND pl.status = "복용중" AND date = curdate() AND al.time > DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%H:%i') ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 5;
